sources.title: Buried Alive
sources.description: Actors: Robert Wilcox; Beverly Roberts; Paul McVey; Dave O'Brien Director: Victor Halperin Writers: William A. Ullman, Jr.; George Bricker Runtime: 1:14:44 A prison movie. The copyright notice in the opening credits is invalid, so this film is in the public domain.Â  Even if the copyright notice were valid, this would still be p.d. because there is no copyright renewal to be found.
